response: Mikey Chen is the CEO at Think Foundation, which is a non-profit organization focused on innovative thinking. He also holds the title of Story Samurai within the same organization. You've had a few interactions with him recently, noting that you met him and mentioned his LinkedIn handle, which is @mikeychen. If you're looking to connect with him further or learn more about his work, checking out his LinkedIn profile might be a good start!
